metadata.title: CVE-2023-20246 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple Cisco products are affected by a vulnerability in Snort accesscontrol policies that could allow an unauthenticated, remote attacker tobypass the configured policies on an affected system. This vulnerability isdue to a logic error that occurs when the access control policies are beingpopulated. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by establishing aconnection to an affected device. A successful exploit could allow theattacker to bypass configured access control rules on the affected system.

criterions.comment: snort: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
